title: Djvai7
author: Djvai7
content: Does Bounty Winner Pay Every Week?

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: Each bounty campaign has its own rules. Usually the payment is made at the end of the campaign, but sometimes when the salary is predetermined and not based on stakes, the rewards are paid on a weekly basis. Read the rules of the bounty campaign you want to participate in carefully.
